title: Always show how long battery will last in status bar
content:
I just got my new Pixel 3a and I liked that it showed how long the battery will last (at current usage I think?) when I pulled down the status bar. Yesterday I saw that there was just the "normal" percentage instead of the estimated time it will die. At sometime today it switched back to estimate.

I did searched on the settings and the internet but could not find anything about it.

So my question is how can I enable this feature full time or if I cant what does it depend on?

BR
Tim Fahrner
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a
